title: How to set up your mac to develop news applications like we do
description: This blog is a living document dating back to 2013. Each time someone onboards, they contribute to the blog to keep it up to date.  When my machine crapped out in 2023, I got to overhaul the blog, bringing it in line with our current set of tools. It's due for another round of updates now that Anaconda is limiting it's free tier of use.

title: Tools for attractive and fast web-based maps: peaking inside NPR’s workflow
description: My chaotic attempt to share some of the secret sauce that allows us at NPR to make maps on deadline, building on ai2html and other workflows.

title: Building a beautiful and clear map from massive, complex data
description: An in-depth guide to how I processed a large raster dataset for United States of Wildfire feature.
